```{r, eval=FALSE}
## RSelenium + phantomJS
library(XML)
library(RSelenium)

pJS <- phantom()
Sys.sleep(5)
remDr <- remoteDriver(browserName = 'phantomjs')
remDr$open()

url <- 'http://www.cpbl.com.tw/stats_hr.aspx'
remDr$navigate(url)

```
